content.detail: Onboarded and shepherded the relaunch of the Disney Games site in order for the Games team to market Disney-published games. Trained the team's site producers on how to utilize the out-of-box tools provided through the proprietary CMS that I am product manager for. Coordinated the launch of this site with our infrastructure team. I also ensured that the site was set up for accessible standards.

images.alt: Detail page for Disney Gargoyles Remastered game
